revised_title: Investigation of Radium and Thorium Y-Rays and Their Nuclear Level Systems
tldr: The author conducted new experiments to measure the y-rays emitted by radium C and thorium C+C'. They improved the accuracy of the energy measurements and compared the results with the a-ray measurements to determine the nuclear level systems of these radioactive elements. The study provides valuable information about the excitation energy of the nucleus and the connection between y-ray energies and a-ray energies.
